$VERB I've been doing some research and some people have been right about Rory, but Rory has been working hard to turn this sinking ship around. Actually being integrated into $MSFT outlook proves the team is working hard in delivering. $GOOG integration seems difficult because they carry a flagship video business via YouTube. 

Rory mentioned long time share holders in the last CC, and mentioned short sighted people as being taking a turn for the worse. 

Since that debacle, verb has turned for the worse in terms of Share price and it's really led me to question what's going on. Either he's bsing or market will be here. I put money on the line that I can't say won't matter if I lose it. It will be disgusting if this goes to zero, like I've had an investment in $OAS go to zero in the past. 

Dusk is darkest before dawn, and Rory may very well be on the cusp of turning this new , unproven scrappy start up into a huge winner for 2022 and beyond.
